modules.description: Provides functions to create, modify, and visualize triangular meshes, including exporting mesh data to LaTeX, SciLab, and Matlab. Operates on mesh structures composed of nodes, edges, and triangles, with support for geometric transformations. Enables integration with external mesh generation tools through bindings, facilitating advanced computational geometry workflows.

Draws triangular meshes and Voronoi diagrams with customizable colors, point markers, and triangle-specific callbacks. Renders level curves for scalar fields on a 2D grid, with options to highlight regions above or below a threshold value. Operates on mesh data structures containing points, triangles, and Voronoi information, producing visualizations in an OCaml Graphics window.
